Package org.smooks.engine.delivery.sax.ng

Class SystemConsumeSerializerVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smooks.engine.delivery.sax.ng.SimpleSerializerVisitor
      • org.smooks.engine.delivery.sax.ng.ConsumeSerializerVisitor
        • org.smooks.engine.delivery.sax.ng.SystemConsumeSerializerVisitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentHandler, DOMElementVisitor, DOMVisitAfter, DOMVisitBefore, DOMVisitor, AfterVisitor, BeforeVisitor, ChildrenVisitor, ElementVisitor, SaxNgVisitor, SerializerVisitor, Visitor
    public class SystemConsumeSerializerVisitor
extends ConsumeSerializerVisitor
    SystemConsumeSerializerVisitor consumes and serializes a node iff ContentDeliveryConfig.isDefaultSerializationOn() in this execution context returns true.
